{{cpp/title|is_execution_policy}}
{{cpp/algorithm/navbar}}

{{ddcl|header = execution|since=c++17|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
struct is_execution_policy;
}}

Checks whether {{tt|T}} is a standard or implementation-defined execution policy type.

Provides the member constant {{c|value}} which is equal to {{c|true}}, if {{tt|T}} is [[cpp/algorithm/execution_policy_tag_t|a standard execution policy type]], or an implementation-defined execution policy type. Otherwise, {{c|value}} is equal to {{c|false}}.

{{cpp/types/nospec|pv}}

===Template parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|T|a type to check}}
{{par end}}

===Helper template===
{{ddcl|header = execution|since=c++17|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
constexpr bool is_execution_policy_v = std::is_execution_policy&lt;T&gt;::value;
}}

{{cpp/types/integral_constant/inherit|{{tt|T}} is a standard or implementation-defined execution policy type}}

{{example
|code=
#include &lt;execution&gt;

static_assert(std::is_execution_policy_v&lt;std::execution::unsequenced_policy&gt;);
static_assert(!std::is_execution_policy_v&lt;int&gt;);

int main() {}
}}
